goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 1361kB)
graph_title: Percentage satisfied with the way the council runs things
indicator_available: Percentage satisfied with the way the council runs things
indicator_description: Percentage of respondents to survey determined to be satisfied with the way the council runs things
computation_definitions: Number of respondents who select/tick "very satisfied" or "fairly satisfied" divided by total number of respondents excluding "don't know"
computation_calculations: No additional calculations were performed on the dataset and it is shown as found. The dataset specifies its calculations as the number of respondents who select/tick "very satisfied" or "fairly satisfied" divided by total number of respondents excluding "don't know".
other_information: Any other info on the dataset, e.g. data control applied?
